ResearchProjectDef.label: death acidifier
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce death acidifiers to prevent other players from killing your colonists for their possessions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mechanoid communications
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the communication channels of the mechanoids. Whilst mechanoids are not "diplomatic" creatures, they may be open to certain deals that benefit them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mechanoid relations
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further study into the language and communication of mechanoid species. This will allow slightly more favourable deals with them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: native languages
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study the language of the native tribes. They will recognize this and will give you a slight discount for bounty work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: native culture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop a deeper cultural understanding of the tribal factions. They will recognize this and will give you a significant discount for bounty work.
